instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to and tap Language & keyboard . Tap HTC Sense Input . Tap Keyboard selection . Tap Keyboard types . Select one of these options: Standard (QWERTY) The standard QWERTY keyboard is the default keyboard. Its layout is similar to that of a desktop computer keyboard. In landscape mode (when the phone is held horizontally) the standard QWERTY keyboard displays even if the phone keyboard is selected. Standard (AZERTY) Standard (QWERTZ) Phone The layout of the phone keyboard resembles that of the traditional mobile phone keypad. The phone keyboard displays only in portrait mode (when the phone is held vertically)
Select any text entry field. Tap the 12# key to switch to numbers and symbols; tap the 1/2 key to switch between symbol keypads. Tap the ABC key to switch back to text entry.
Tap and hold the Microphone key. When the 'Speak now' window pops up, say the words and numbers you want. Tap the Keyboard icon to exit the speech-to-text mode.
Separately tap each letter of a word. Tap the Space key between words.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap Language & keyboard . Select HTC Sense Input . Select or deselect Vibration feedback .
